items.preText: James: "Zimbabwe first need to concentrate on building a platform to win the game. If they're in a position to chase a bonus point later, they can go for it." 4:11pm Hamilton Masakadza makes his way out, playing his 182nd ODI. He'll have Solomon Mire for company. Shakib to start proceedings. 4:03pm To secure a bonus-point win, Zimbabwe need to chase the target inside 40.1 overs. That will force Sri Lanka to win their last game with bonus points. The second final spot, however, may still come down to net run-rate if both teams win since Zimbabwe and Sri Lanka are both 1-1 on head to head.
items.text: good length on middle stump, tries to whip this square off the back foot, and they're off for a slow single. Mire's quick, but is he quick enough? Quick work from the fielder at point, and the keeper breaks the stumps. They're going up to the third umpire! It's not out.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, 1 run

items.preText: Shuvo Shafiqur : "This is going to be a tricky chase!! Mouth watering prospect ahead of us!! "
items.text: full just outside off, big stride forward and defend. Takes the inside edge and flies away towards square leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, pushed past the bowler's left to mid off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, big stride forward and defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, tries a big sweep but he misses the shot. The keeper can't get behind it either. Beats Mushfiqur, and races away therafter
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, 5 wides

items.text: tossed up full on off stump, prods forward and defends
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.text: good length on middle and leg, tries to work it behind square off his pads, but misses
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mire, no run

items.preText: Dilhan from Sri Lanka: "Zim should remain cool while chasing by building partnerships meanwhile Sri Lanka will be in FREEZE mode at the hotel. "
items.text: on a good length outside off, but swinging further away from the right hander. He's got to bowl that one again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 1 wide

items.text: on a good length outside off stump, swings away after pitching. Masakadza shoulders his arms
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: on a good length outside off stump, shapes away once again. Left alone after covering his off-stump line
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: full outside off, and zips off the surface! Extra bounce after pitching outside the stumps, and through to the keeper
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: full just outside off, prods forward and defends firmly towards the cover region
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, angling into his pads and put away off his legs. Flicked past midwicket, forcing the fielder to give it a chase
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 2 runs

items.text: good length on off stump, punched straight down the ground off the back foot. Punched too well, infact. Smashes straight into the stumps at the non-striker's end, but the ricochet allows them to scamper through for the single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, prods forward and tries to defend, but played down the wrong line. Raps him in front of the stumps, and that's a big appeal for lbw. Turned down, but they're reviewing! Was impact just outside off? That would save Masakadza, otherwise Hammy looks plumb. Ball tracking says impact was outside off stump. That's a wasted review.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, no run

items.text: tossed up on the channel just outside off, big stride forward from the batsman, but he defends inside the line of the ball. The delivery zips past his outside edge. So close.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, no run

items.text: on a good length on off stump, tapped back to Shakib
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, no run

items.text: tossed up on middle and off, spins away after pitching, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, no run

items.text: good length outside off, forces the batsman to rock back. Punched off the back foot, but straight to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, angling into the big right hander. Cramped for space, but does well to cut this away. Can't beat the man at point, though
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, no run

items.preText: Ritwik Mondal: "A perfect contest would be if ZM beats BD this match and SL wins over BD in the next match in higher margin. Tri-Nation series series will be triangular with equal sides and angles. "
items.text: good length wide outside off, entices Mire to chase at it. Slight swing away from the right hander, and that forces him to miss
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mire, no run

items.text: good length on middle and leg, tapped off his pads to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mire, 1 run

items.preText: Sawan: "A good match to watch being a cricket fan. But as a Bangladeshi, not happy with the batting performance. Playing Nasir as a lower order batsman who can bowl Off spin is not really preferable over Mehedi Miraj."
items.text: good length on middle and leg, tries to flick this fine behind square but misses as the ball goes down the leg side. Sharp take from the keeper, diving to his left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 1 wide

items.text: there's the big one! Back of a length outside off, angling away from Hammy after pitching. He tried to punch at it, but it's so far away from his body. Takes a thick outside edge, and easily pocketed by first slip
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, OUT

dismissal.text: H Masakadza c Sabbir Rahman b Mashrafe Mortaza 5 (15b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33

items.text: full on middle and off, defended firmly off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, no run
